title: I can't flash mastery or emote when I'm dead?

replies.body: One of the recent patches adjusted mastery emotes was tweaked slightly to not allow spamming, which also extends to when you're dead.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TZ1Zqmfi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-01T03:53:01.645+0000)
>
> One of the recent patches adjusted mastery emotes was tweaked slightly to not allow spamming, which also extends to when you're dead.

that isn't the case for me. I wont flash it all game, and then I die and go to flash something but nothing pops up

> [{quoted}](name=SeasofHyperion,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TZ1Zqmfi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-01T04:50:39.514+0000)
>
> that isn't the case for me. I wont flash it all game, and then I die and go to flash something but nothing pops up

They made it so you can only do an emote once and you have to use it shortly after you die.

Ahhhh your keybindings might actually be a little borked if it NEVER works. We can try giving your keybindings a quick reset, but keep in mind this is going to reset *all* of your keybinds back to default.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
